trans-unit.source: Represents the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<CipherReference>" name="<CipherReference>" href=""></xref> element in XML encryption.
trans-unit.target: Representerer den <xref uid="langword_csharp_<CipherReference>" name="<CipherReference>" href=""> </xref> element i XML-kryptering.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen kan ikke arves.

trans-unit.source: This class represents the `<CipherReference>` element in XML encryption.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen representerer den `<CipherReference>` element i XML-kryptering.

trans-unit.source: It identifies a source which, when processed, yields the encrypted data.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer en datakilde som, når behandlet, gir du de krypterte dataene.

trans-unit.source: The actual encrypted data referenced by the `<CipherReference>` is obtained by the following process.
trans-unit.target: Den faktiske krypterte data som refererer til den `<CipherReference>` hentes av følgende prosess.

trans-unit.source: The `<CipherReference> URI` property contains a Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) that is dereferenced.
trans-unit.target: Den `<CipherReference> URI` egenskapen inneholder en URI Uniform Resource Identifier () som er forsøkte å nå refererende.

trans-unit.source: If the `<CipherReference>` element also contains a transform chain, the data resulting from dereferencing the URI is transformed as specified to produce the encrypted data.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den `<CipherReference>` elementet også inneholder en transformering kjede, blir dataene fra dereferensiering URIEN transformert som er angitt til å produsere de krypterte dataene.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the encrypted data is base64-encoded within an XML document, the transforms would specify an XPath expression followed by a base64 decoding so the encrypted data can be extracted.
trans-unit.target: Hvis de krypterte dataene er base64-kodet i et XML-dokument, ville for eksempel transformeringene angi et XPath-uttrykk etterfulgt av en base64-dekoding slik at de krypterte dataene kan trekkes ut.

trans-unit.source: The syntax of the URI and transforms is similar to that of XML digital signatures.
trans-unit.target: Syntaksen for URI og transformeringer er lik verdien for XML-signaturer.

trans-unit.source: However, in XML digital signatures, both generation and validation processing start with the same source data and perform that transform in the same order.
trans-unit.target: Imidlertid i XML-signaturer både generering og validering behandling starte med de samme kildedataene og utføre den transformeringen i samme rekkefølge.

trans-unit.source: In XML encryption, the decrypting application has only the encrypted data and the specified transforms.
trans-unit.target: I XML-kryptering har dekryptering programmet de krypterte dataene og de angitte transformeringene.

trans-unit.source: The transforms are enumerated in the order necessary to obtain the encrypted data.
trans-unit.target: Transformeringene listes i rekkefølgen som er nødvendig for å få de krypterte dataene.

trans-unit.source: **Note** By default, you cannot dereference cipher references from documents with unknown sources, such as files from a Web site, because the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.DocumentEvidence%2A> property is **null**.
trans-unit.target: **Obs** som standard du kan ikke sikkerhetsproblem dereferensiering cipher referanser fra dokumenter med ukjente kilder, for eksempel filer fra et webområde, fordi den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.DocumentEvidence%2A>egenskapen **null**.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.DocumentEvidence%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, when you attempt to decrypt a file containing a `<CipherReference>` element that references a file on the Web, a <xref:System.Security.SecurityException> is thrown, even if the request is made by a fully trusted assembly.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel når du prøver å kryptere en fil som inneholder en `<CipherReference>` element som refererer til en fil på nettet, en <xref:System.Security.SecurityException>er et, selv om forespørselen utføres av en fullstendig klarert samling.</xref:System.Security.SecurityException>

trans-unit.source: If you are sure the documents you are decrypting can be trusted, you can change this behavior for fully trusted applications by using the following code: ``` Evidence ev = new Evidence(); ev.AddHost (new Zone(SecurityZone.MyComputer)); EncryptedXml exml = new EncryptedXml(doc, ev); ```
trans-unit.target: Hvis du er sikker på at du dekryptering dokumentene kan klareres, kan du endre denne virkemåten for fullstendig klarerte programmer ved hjelp av følgende kode:``` Evidence ev = new Evidence(); ev.AddHost (new Zone(SecurityZone.MyComputer)); EncryptedXml exml = new EncryptedXml(doc, ev); ```

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherReference"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherReference"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherReference> object that provides reference information for a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData> object.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren oppretter en <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherReference>objekt som inneholder referanseinformasjon for en <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData>objektet.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherReference>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherReference"></xref> class using the specified Uniform Resource Identifier (URI).
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherReference"> </xref> klasse ved hjelp av den angitte URI Uniform Resource Identifier ().

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherReference> object using a Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) that points to the encrypted data.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren oppretter en <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherReference>objekt med en URI Uniform Resource Identifier () som peker til de krypterte dataene.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherReference>

trans-unit.source: The object is then used to provide reference information for a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData> object.
trans-unit.target: Objektet er deretter brukes til å angi referanseinformasjon for en <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData>objektet.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData>

trans-unit.source: You can use a URI to designate an XML file containing encrypted data.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke en URI til å angi en XML-fil som inneholder krypterte data.

trans-unit.source: For example: `String uri = "http://www.woodgrovebank.com/document.xml";` You can also use a partial URI to designate that only a portion of an XML document is to be encrypted.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel: `String uri = "http://www.woodgrovebank.com/document.xml";` du kan også bruke en delvis URI til å angi at det er bare en del av en XML-dokumentet å krypteres.

trans-unit.source: For example, assume that an XML document named document.xml contains two `MyForm` elements as shown in the following XML code example: `<MyForm Id='Form1'>` `<! -- Form data here -->` `</MyForm>` `<MyForm Id='Form2'>` `<! -- Form data here -->` `</MyForm>` You can encrypt only the content in `Form2` using a URI such as the following: `String uri = "http://www.woodgrovebank.com/document.xml#Form2";`
trans-unit.target: For eksempel anta at et XML-dokument navnet document.xml inneholder to `MyForm` elementer som vises i følgende XML-kodeeksempel: `<MyForm Id='Form1'>` `<! -- Form data here -->` `</MyForm>` `<MyForm Id='Form2'>` `<! -- Form data here -->` `</MyForm>` du kan kryptere bare innhold i `Form2` ved hjelp av en URI som følgende: `String uri = "http://www.woodgrovebank.com/document.xml#Form2";`

trans-unit.source: A Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) pointing to the encrypted data.
trans-unit.target: En URI Uniform Resource Identifier () peker til de krypterte dataene.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherReference"></xref> class using the specified Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) and transform chain information.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherReference"> </xref> klasse ved hjelp av den angitte IDen URI (Uniform Resource) og transformering kjede informasjonen.

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherReference> object using a Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) and transform chain to indicate the encrypted data.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren oppretter en <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherReference>objekt med en identifikator URI (Uniform Resource) og transformering kjede til å angi de krypterte dataene.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherReference>

trans-unit.source: The object is then used to provide reference information for a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData> object.
trans-unit.target: Objektet er deretter brukes til å angi referanseinformasjon for en <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData>objektet.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData>

trans-unit.source: A Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) pointing to the encrypted data.
trans-unit.target: En URI Uniform Resource Identifier () peker til de krypterte dataene.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.TransformChain"></xref> object that describes transforms to do on the encrypted data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.TransformChain"> </xref> -objektet som beskriver transformeringer gjøre på de krypterte dataene.

trans-unit.source: Returns the XML representation of a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherReference"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer XML-representasjon av en <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherReference"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to output the `<CipherReference>` element in XML.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne metoden til å sende den `<CipherReference>` element i XML.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref> that represents the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<CipherReference>" name="<CipherReference>" href=""></xref> element in XML encryption.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"> </xref> som representerer den <xref uid="langword_csharp_<CipherReference>" name="<CipherReference>" href=""> </xref> element i XML-kryptering.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherReference"></xref> value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherReference"></xref> value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Loads XML information into the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<CipherReference>" name="<CipherReference>" href=""></xref> element in XML encryption.
trans-unit.target: Laster inn XML-informasjon i den <xref uid="langword_csharp_<CipherReference>" name="<CipherReference>" href=""> </xref> element i XML-kryptering.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to load an existing XML element into the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherReference> object.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne metoden til å laste inn en eksisterende XML-elementet i den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherReference>objektet.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherReference>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref> object that represents an XML element to use as the reference.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"> </xref> objektet som representerer en XML-elementet skal brukes som referanse.

trans-unit.source: The value provided is .
trans-unit.target: The value provided is .
